Hiking

About hiking

Diamond NotchLands in New Jersey. Cab or train into the city or drive to West Kill.
Hunter MountainLands in North Queens. Cab or take bus to to train into city.
West Kill WildernessLands in South Queens. Cab or train into the city.
North Lake HikeLands in South Queens. Cab or train into the city.
Kaaterskill FallsLands in South Queens. Cab or train into the city.
